object_name.value: Validate Cat 4 document has interim versions

title.value: Used to validate the "purge interim versions" lifecycle operation for Category 4 documents.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
''$value(object_name)'' has no interim historic / non-issued versions to be purged.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc(all) where i_chronicle_id = '$value(i_chronicle_id)' and r_object_id != '$value(r_object_id)' and a_status in ('Historic', 'Not Issued'))
